name: 4H3DGM
description:
Fight bad octopuses to get the highest score.

Controls:

  • WSAD - move
  • Mouse - look around
  • LMB - start game, shoot
  • Escape - pause
  • Space - charge

Pro tip: Collect hearts above water to replenish health.

Source code available at https://github.com/kraifpatrik/4H3DGM.

The entire development process captured at https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1721002122.
